name: YIIotCamera
0:
”Alexa, show the room camera”
”Alexa, show the office camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
cameras are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the YI Iot app on your smartphone 

With the skill YI IOT Camera and Alexa, you can now interact with your YI iot cameras by voice. 

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your YI IOT account* and discover your cameras. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa: http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the skill, you will need to create names for your devices. There are two ways to create these names:

1. Use the names you previously set up. This will be shown in the YI Iot app and can be changed.

2. Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add devices to that group. 

More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group http://amzn.to/2pIe1Vq

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show the room camera"
"Alexa, show the backyard camera"

*To use this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the YI Iot app.
